article.title: Diligent Receives Information Assurance Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Diligent Consulting Incorporated, San Antonio, Texas, was awarded a $24 million contract to provide for Air Education and Training Command Department of Defense information assurance certification and accreditation process support services.Â Air Armament Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
